data.text: @alfonslopeztena Senor Tena, US states are adopting this policy also.

@alfonslopeztena UK’s doing the same and has basically surrendered to the virus. Numbers are going up, but “we’ve beaten the pandemic” 🙄
Particularly disturbing for me at the moment as my elderly mother has just come down with it.

@alfonslopeztena Been the same in UK for about three weeks!
Pretend it’s not here and it’ll just go away #ineptgovernment #JohnsonOut46
@alfonslopeztena #Spain's government making less eye contact with #COVID? That'll stop it from mutating!
@alfonslopeztena Domicrom will follow suit pretty quickly
